mapper.insert: insert into user values(null, #{userName}, #{year}, #{dept}, #{major}, #{mobile}, md5(#{password}), now(), now())
mapper.select: select id, userName, year, dept, major, mobile from user where password = md5(#{password}) and userName = #{userNameOrMobile} or mobile = #{userNameOrMobile} and password = md5(#{password})
select id from user where mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.update: update user set userName = #{userName}, year = #{year}, dept = #{dept}, major = #{major}, mobile = #{mobile}, updateTime = now() where id = #{id}
update user set password = md5(#{password}), updateTime = now() where id = #{id}
